name: Bean Escape (Sebilizator)
description:
(game in development)

Press Alt F4 to exit the game.

W A S D -> movement 

 space -> jump

Left Shift -> sprint

Collect 4 key fragments to escape from the Local Bean Factory. Sounds like an easy task, but it isn't. An evil bean will hunt you. (the game is in early stages of development so the bean can't hurt you yet)
